captions.text:
Hi, my name is Jason Ryan. Welcome
to my cab. This is Viking Mafia 5150.

The 5150V basically stands for crazy.
It's an LAPD call sign,

and we couldn't think of any better name
for the truck but 'crazy' or 'insane'.
So, 5150 Volvo.

This truck came from a lot of years of
thinking about all the things I could do
that nobody else has done before.

It was a case of actually trying
to make it all turn into real life.

People laugh at a lot of things
that I wanted to do,
but we eventually pulled it off.

When we started trying to come up
with something different for this truck,

the exhaust pipes were something
I wanted to play around with.

We got four induction pipes
and eight exhaust pipes,

and to top it off,
a lady Viking over the top of it all.

In trying to do things differently,
we decided to drill holes in the swords

and put lights inside them. Everything
functions - reverse light, brake,

park light, indicators,
and another park light at the top.

With the inside of the cab, we didn't
want to change things too much.

I certainly love the way the interiors
on these trucks are presented.

They've done very well,
the quality's awesome.

Basically we changed the trim on the
seats from the original Volvo trim...
Black leather, black suede...

When it came to the stereo,
we decided to just go a little bit nuts.

The thing will blow the windows out
if you turn the volume up high enough.

Other than that, the 70 inch LED TV
just kind of topped it off.
Okay, let's give this baby a run.

We tried a few different ideas
on what to do with the tanks.

We wrapped them in leather. It didn't
look that good until we bolted them on
and these straps got airbrushed.

That end result
we're just stoked with.

You know, guys that traditionally
wouldn't look at a Volvo, for instance,

or anything along the line
of the European trucks,

can't help but respect the amount
of work and art that's gone into that.

I'm proud that we can take
a bit of the attention away

from some of the traditional styles
of trucks in Australia,

and make people look at this
and say, 'That is pretty cool.'

title: Volvo Trucks - Jason Ryan shows off his Viking Mafia truck - "Welcome to my cab"
